DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate ability tedisamil convert atrial fibrillation flutter normal sinus rhythm ( NSR ) female patient .
DOC.brief_title: Intravenous Tedisamil Rapid Conversion Atrial Fibrillation Flutter Normal Sinus Rhythm Female Subjects
DOC.criteria: Willing sign inform consent screen examination perform study drug administer Females > 18 year age Subjects document ( 60 second rhythm strip ) symptomatic atrial fibrillation flutter ( duration > 3 hour < 45 day ) time randomization Subjects distress hemodynamically stable ( supine systolic blood pressure > 90 mmHg diastolic blood pressure < 105 mmHg ) Pregnancy lactation Acute myocardial infarction cerebrovascular accident Coronary syndrome congestive heart failure ( CHF ) New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) IV Lifethreatening ventricular arrhythmia electrocardiogram ( ECG ) abnormalities Concurrent antiarrhythmic treatment
DOC.keyword: Atrial fibrillation , atrial flutter , anti-arrhythmic agent , conversion normal sinus rhythm
